latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to submit a corrective action plan within five days when required corrective action plan not approved
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service teaching staff acting as assistant teachers do not meet age and educational requirements
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations
